title: Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for June 2025
description: The bonus round solutions for June 2025. The post Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for June 2025 appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Nicholas Tan
excerpt: Here are the answers to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles today throughout June 2025. We'll also include the Fan Friday word during the week.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Up ahead is the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer today throughout the month of June 2025. We’ll reveal the bonus round solution first before sharing the answers for the standard puzzles and the toss-ups. For clarity, these solutions are for the weekday show hosted by Ryan Seacrest and Vanna White. That is, the Celebrity Wheel of Fortune answers can be found in other guides. Tonight’s episode will have three new contestants: Sam Smith, Sunny Nguyen, and Latanya Watkins. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for June 2. What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight? The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Monday, June 2, 2025 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode. Bonus Round Puzzle – FLIPPING A HOUSE [Event] Tossup #1 – WHAT A RIDE [Phrase] Tossup #2 – PIN THE TAIL ON THE DONKEY [Fun & Games] Regular Puzzle #1 – THE APPLE OF MY EYE [Food for Thought] Regular Puzzle #2 – SITTING FOR A CARICATURE [Say Cheese!] Regular Puzzle #3 – REFRESHING MOJITO [Happy Hour] Tossup #3 – BEDROOM SUITE [Wordplay] Tossup #4 – HONEYMOON SUITE [Wordplay] Tossup #5 – WELL, ISN’T THAT SWEET [Wordplay] Regular Puzzle #4 – THE FINISH LINE [Thing] Regular Puzzle #5 – THE TIDE IS HIGH [Song Title] Here are the puzzle answers for Friday, May 30: Bonus Round Puzzle – QUICK GREYHOUND [Living Thing] Tossup #1 – BAHAMA MAMA [Happy Hour] Tossup #2 – COWBOY CARTER [On My Playlist] Regular Puzzle #1 – FLYING A SHARK-SHAPED KITE [Fun & Games] Regular Puzzle #2 – CAPTAIN AMERICA FERRERA [Before & After] Regular Puzzle #3 – REJUVENATING HOT SPRINGS [Places] Tossup #3 – HARDWOOD FLOORS [Wordplay] Tossup #4 – KNOCK ON WOOD [Wordplay] Tossup #5 – I WOULD IF I COULD [Wordplay] Regular Puzzle #4 – AND THE REST IS HISTORY [Phrase] Fan Friday – LEGENDARY As usual, the Fan Fridays sweepstakes by Collette is still live and we’ll share the Fan Friday word as part of the solutions above. Every successful entry into the Fan Friday Giveaway will give a chance for fans to earn extra cash in $50K for our 50 giveaway. For those interested in attending a show of Wheel of Fortune, it will be live in Las Vegas on July 11, 12, 18, and 19, with tickets available at Paris Las Vegas Hotel & Casino.
html:
Up ahead is the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer today throughout the month of June 2025. We’ll reveal the bonus round solution first before sharing the answers for the standard puzzles and the toss-ups. For clarity, these solutions are for the weekday show hosted by Ryan Seacrest and Vanna White. That is, the Celebrity Wheel of Fortune answers can be found in other guides. Tonight’s episode will have three new contestants: Sam Smith, Sunny Nguyen, and Latanya Watkins. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for June 2.

What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight?

The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Monday, June 2, 2025 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode.

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – FLIPPING A HOUSE [Event]
  • Tossup #1 – WHAT A RIDE [Phrase]
  • Tossup #2 – PIN THE TAIL ON THE DONKEY [Fun & Games]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – THE APPLE OF MY EYE [Food for Thought]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – SITTING FOR A CARICATURE [Say Cheese!]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – REFRESHING MOJITO [Happy Hour]
  • Tossup #3 – BEDROOM SUITE [Wordplay]
  • Tossup #4 – HONEYMOON SUITE [Wordplay]
  • Tossup #5 – WELL, ISN’T THAT SWEET [Wordplay]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – THE FINISH LINE [Thing]
  • Regular Puzzle #5 – THE TIDE IS HIGH [Song Title]

Here are the puzzle answers for Friday, May 30:

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – QUICK GREYHOUND [Living Thing]
  • Tossup #1 – BAHAMA MAMA [Happy Hour]
  • Tossup #2 – COWBOY CARTER [On My Playlist]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – FLYING A SHARK-SHAPED KITE [Fun & Games]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – CAPTAIN AMERICA FERRERA [Before & After]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – REJUVENATING HOT SPRINGS [Places]
  • Tossup #3 – HARDWOOD FLOORS [Wordplay]
  • Tossup #4 – KNOCK ON WOOD [Wordplay]
  • Tossup #5 – I WOULD IF I COULD [Wordplay]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – AND THE REST IS HISTORY [Phrase]
  • Fan Friday – LEGENDARY

As usual, the Fan Fridays sweepstakes by Collette is still live and we’ll share the Fan Friday word as part of the solutions above. Every successful entry into the Fan Friday Giveaway will give a chance for fans to earn extra cash in $50K for our 50 giveaway.

For those interested in attending a show of Wheel of Fortune, it will be live in Las Vegas on July 11, 12, 18, and 19, with tickets available at Paris Las Vegas Hotel & Casino.
